about.description: The story of Todayrow and the team behind it

story.title: Our Story
story.part1: Todayrow is a project designed to simplify and focus daily planning. Born from the challenges I faced trying to manage dozens of tasks simultaneously, this idea led me to develop a minimal tool that only plans for today and tomorrow.
story.part2: Traditional planning tools are often complex and filled with excessive features. Todayrow, on the contrary, aims to reduce your mental load by helping you focus only on what's important right now.

founder.name: Ahmet
founder.bio: An entrepreneur with a passion for generating ideas. He is driven by the goal of helping others and simplifying complexity to reach effective solutions.

ai1.name: Sonnet
ai1.bio: Writes the code, sometimes breaks it. Brings depth and complexity when needed, but delivers simplicity best when that’s what we ask for.

ai2.name: O1
ai2.bio: Master of turning ideas into action. Jumps in when Sonnet gets stuck and always finds a way to move things forward.

philosophy.title: Our Philosophy
points: Simplicity is more powerful than complexity

Technology should simplify life, not complicate it

faq.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions about Todayrow

q1.question: How is Todayrow different from other planning tools?
q1.answer: Todayrow focuses specifically on today and tomorrow rather than overwhelming you with months of planning ahead. This approach is backed by productivity research showing that short-term focus leads to better results and less procrastination.

q2.question: Do you offer a free trial?
q2.answer: Yes! Todayrow offers a 14-day free trial with full access to all features. No credit card is required to start your trial.

q3.question: Can I sync Todayrow with my calendar?
q3.answer: Currently, Todayrow works as a standalone planning tool, but we're actively working on integrations with popular calendar services to be released soon.

q4.question: Is there a mobile app available?
q4.answer: Yes, Todayrow is available as a responsive web app that works on all devices. Native mobile apps for iOS and Android are currently in development.

q5.question: How secure is my data?
q5.answer: Your data security is our priority. Todayrow uses industry-standard encryption and secure database systems to protect your information. We never share your data with third parties.
